Html:
Hello,
  • How did the winrt.d.ts file get generated? Due to it's size, I presume it wasn't by hand ;)
  • Is this a tool that can be made publicly available?
What I'm interested in is a tool that we can use to pass in 1 or more *.winmd files and have it generate a *.d.ts file from the metadata.

Thoughts?

Thanks

Didn't hear back, but after looking further into the files I noticed too many inconsistencies for the .d.ts file to have been generated by a tool (maybe?).

If anyone is interested I created a new project.

ToTypeScriptD

I'd appreciate feedback. It's pretty green at this point, but in the short amount of time I've spent on it, it's generating some pretty good TypeScript Definition files.

Hope this helps.
